DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety convenient 3-chamber-bag containing aminoacids , glucose lipid emulsion ( LCT/MCT 20 % ) compare conventionally compound monobag parenteral nutrition .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : •Patients consider elective open abdominal surgery Male female patient ≥18 < 85 year age Indication total parenteral nutrition therapy : 6 consecutive day NRS ≥3 Ability willingness give voluntary consent participate study , follow full explanation nature purpose study , sign informed consent form approve Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) prior evaluation , comply requirement study Exclusion : Major criterion : Body weight < 50 kg > 70 kg Laparoscopic surgery Seriously ill patient need high energy nutrition support ( i. e. > 2100 Kcal/day ) Hepatic surgery Surgery estimate blood loss > 1000ml Participation clinical study investigational drug investigational medical device within one month prior start study Receiving regular parenteral nutrition within 7 day onset study General contraindication parenteral nutrition ( acidosis various genesis , untreated disorder electrolyte fluid balance , hyperhydration , acute pulmonary edema , inadequate cellular oxygen supply ) General contraindication infusion therapy acute pulmonary oedema , hyperhydration decompensated cardiac insufficiency , acute stroke Known hypersensitivity egg , soy , peanut protein ingredient
